description: Sun Wenlin, a plaintiff in China's first case addressing the issue of same-sex marriage, and his lawyer reacted to a judge's ruling against them on Wednesday.
title: Plaintiff Reacts to China Gay Marriage Verdict
title_page: Plaintiff Reacts to China Gay Marriage Verdict - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Sun Wenlin, a plaintiff in China's first case addressing the issue of same-sex marriage, and his lawyer reacted to a judge's ruling against them on Wednesday.
